sentences.english: After supper, Cliff spread out his books before him to start reviewing his lessons.
sentences.chinese: 晚飯後克里夫把書本攤在面前開始複習功課。
九龍旺角區菜市場豬肉攤。

sentences.english: Many experts also like to recommend such a low - cost method of apportionment.
sentences.chinese: 很多專家也喜歡向大家推薦這種攤低成本的方法。

sentences.english: Can you tell me where I can find the stinky tofu stand?
sentences.chinese: 你可以告訴我，哪裏可以找到臭豆腐攤嗎？

sentences.english: After school I sat in the office and stared at the records spread out before me.
sentences.chinese: 放學後，我坐在辦公室裏盯着攤放在我面前的檔案。

sentences.english: Among so many restaurants, cafeterias and food stands are most popular with students.
sentences.chinese: 在如此多的餐廳當中，自助餐和小喫攤最受學生歡迎。

sentences.english: Hi, I'm the owner who is a thinking-too-much, capricious, and lazy cat of the vendor in the woods.
sentences.chinese: 我是森林小喫攤的老闆，一隻想太多又很任性的懶貓。

sentences.english: Check out the betel-nut stand near the corner, and try some if you dare.
sentences.chinese: 如果你夠膽量，就試試角落裏的那家檳榔攤。

sentences.english: Coffee making aparatus from the drink stall.
sentences.chinese: 飲料攤裏的咖啡製作工具。

sentences.english: He selected the right chisels from a pile laid out beside him.
sentences.chinese: 他從攤在身邊的一堆鑿子中挑出適用的幾把。

sentences.english: Dogs spend all day sprawled on the most comfortable piece of furniture in the house.
sentences.chinese: 狗找一個房子裏最舒服的角落攤一整天。

sentences.english: I seem to remember some guy in NYC opening a boazi stand.
sentences.chinese: 我記得聽說過有啥人在妞兒越是開過一個包子攤啊。

sentences.english: Boy:Hi Brittany. What are you doing with all of your clothes on your bed?
sentences.chinese: 布坦妮，你把所有衣服攤在牀上做什麼？

sentences.english: With this minimal capital, I can run a small curbside food stand in Shihlin area.
sentences.chinese: 用這點小本錢，我可以在士林擺個小喫攤。

sentences.english: Iced lemon drink from the drink stall, sweet and heavenly in this heat.
sentences.chinese: 來自飲料攤的冰檸檬飲料，在酷暑裏甜甜的透心涼。

sentences.english: " and then spreads the hand of 10 cards, assorted into melds, on the table.
sentences.chinese: 然後將手中的十張牌按組排列攤在桌上。
